    • Method Detail

      • parseAndValidate

        public World parseAndValidate(java.lang.String input,
                     java.util.List<CheckRequirement> req)
                       throws RowNumberException,
                              RowDoesntStartWithWhitespaceException,
                              ColumnNumberException,
                              java.lang.Exception
        This class is used to parse a text file into a world object and verify if it meets the requirements
        Parameters:
        input - String representing a world description
        req - List or Requirements
        Returns:
        returns a World object if parsed and validated successfully
        Throws:
        RowNumberException - actual and formal number or row objects differ
        RowDoesntStartWithWhitespaceException - even row doesn't start with a whitespace
        ColumnNumberException - actual and formal number or column objects differ
        java.lang.Exception - default exception
